channel.title: I JUST GOT A PS2! (But now, what to do with this trash?!)
channel.description: Okay, i've been sorrounded by the x-box and gamecube all my life. I'm left with an X-box, Gamecube, and around 50-60 games. I've jsut gotten a ps2 and like 45 games, 5 controllers, and a memory card (traded my cell phone for it) and my question is: what to do with the old? What do X-box and Gamecube go for in the USA right now? Cuz im lookign to sell them. Thank you for anyone who replies :)

item.title: I JUST GOT A PS2! (But now, what to do with this trash?!)
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“Bebemycat2, post:5, topic:104342”][quote author=dark_child link=topic=149318.msg1415934#msg1415934 date=1180774456]
why dont you just buy a ps3 or xbox 360 if your that rich, and why dont you just keep the xbox and game cube, and sell the games that you dont play anymore
[/quote]
Yeah, why wouldn’t you just get a Xbox 360 or PS3?[/quote]

You should have gotten an Xbox 360. Gears of War!

Read full topic
item.source: I JUST GOT A PS2! (But now, what to do with this trash?!)

item.title: I JUST GOT A PS2! (But now, what to do with this trash?!)
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:14, topic:104342”][quote author=blazefire link=topic=149318.msg1416238#msg1416238 date=1180778285]
softmod or mod your ps2. i play snes and [cough]copied[/cough] games on mine. I didn’t even void the warranty.
[/quote]
any type of modification to your ps2 voids the warranty… just they wont really be able to tell unless its obvious.[/quote] i softmodded it. that means i never opened it or anything. I used a memory card exploit in old fat ps2s.

Read full topic
